item.title: Unfinished pavement replacement, 16th August
item.description:
After the pavement was replaced, the trees have not been kindly tidied. The concrete that got spilt by the trees hasn't been removed. No concrete edges around the trees, soil just dumped around the trees spiling onto the pavement, marking and staining the new pavement. It makes the road look messy, untidy. Not a professional finish.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 67, The Drive, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping of fridge and rubbish, 15th August
item.description:
Reported this fly tipping of fridge and rubbish along the road several times over several weeks but nothing has been done. This reflects badly on the council and the environment. Please do something about this quickly. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Borthwick Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road drainage gulley blocked, 15th August
item.description:
Road drainage gulley outside my house at 65 Normandy way is blocked probably due to the Thames water works going on outside my house. It is giving off a gas like smell and is really strong. Even called the gas emergency thinking it was and they said it was the drain.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Normandy Way, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet
